General.Name: Baosheng
General.Description: Baosheng Science and Technology Innovation Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells fireproof cable products in China. It offers power, electrical equipment, and communication cables; and cable system. The company provides control and instrumentation cables, high-frequency data and network cables, marine engineering cables, electromagnetic wires, overhead wires, construction wires, as well as high, medium, and low voltage cables, precision conductors, and polymer materials. In addition, it offers EPC project general contracting services for electrical engineering design and installation, intelligent equipment, and photovoltaic power station construction. The company's products are used in electric power, rail transit, energy, construction and marine engineering, communications, petroleum, chemical, and automotive sectors. It has operations in Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan. The company exports its products to approximately 40 countries and regions, including Southeast Asia, the Middle East, South America, Europe, Australia, etc. Baosheng Science and Technology Innovation Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Yangzhou, China.
